titles.title: A resolution authorizing the use of depositions in connection with an impeachment inquiry of the Committee on the Judiciary.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 401 - 0 (Record Vote No: 377).

bill.summary: 10/3/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the House Committee on the Judiciary or its Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights to authorize the taking of affidavits and of depositions in connection with the inquiry into the conduct of U.S. District Judge Walter L. Nixon, Jr.
